branchCategory.name: PEAPP
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's PEAPP series of polyethylene tubing is manufactured from linear low density resin for excellent environmental stress crack resistance.  This economical, lightweight material has excellent chemical resistance.  It is available in six primary colors and lengths of 100, 250, 500 and 1,000 ft. depending on size.</p>

branchItem.name: PEAPP, Linear Low Density Polyethylene Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's PEAPP series of polyethylene tubing is manufactured from linear low density resin for excellent environmental stress crack resistance.  This economical, lightweight material has excellent chemical resistance.  It is available in six primary colors and lengths of 100, 250, 500 and 1,000 ft. depending on size.</p>
